widget
Class MTPicture

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              widget.MTComponent
                  widget.MTPicture
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MTPicture
extends MTComponent

Un MTComponent d'image

L'image peut etre reorientee, agrandie, relocatee en utilisant la planche MultiTouch

Version:
07/01/10
Author:
LING Huabin
See Also:
BufferedImage, File, LineBorder, Serialized Form
